5.0.0-beta.1.title: New Beta Available - 5.0.0-beta.2
5.0.0-beta.1.content: Version 5.0.0-beta.2 is now available with important bug fixes including the macOS keychain prompt issue. This update also improves startup performance and reduces logging noise.

5.0.0-beta.2.title: Thank you for testing!
5.0.0-beta.2.content: You're running the latest beta version. Your feedback helps make CST Reader better. Please report any issues you encounter.

4.5.0.title: Beta Version Available
4.5.0.content: A new beta version (5.0.0-beta.2) is available for testing. It includes a complete rewrite with Avalonia UI for cross-platform support.

default.title: Outdated Version
default.content: A newer version is available with bug fixes and performance improvements. Please consider updating to the latest release.

announcements.title: macOS Keychain Issue Resolved
announcements.content: The persistent keychain access prompt on macOS has been fixed in beta.2. The application no longer triggers keychain requests during normal operation.

announcements.title: Automatic XML Updates Now Available
announcements.content: CST Reader now automatically checks for and downloads updated Pali texts from GitHub. Files are only downloaded when changes are detected, saving bandwidth and time.

announcements.title: Enhanced Search Functionality
announcements.content: Search now supports wildcards and regular expressions across all 14 Pali scripts. The new incremental indexing system significantly improves startup performance.

criticalNotices.message: Critical: Alpha versions have a known data corruption issue. Please upgrade immediately to beta.2 or later to avoid potential data loss.
